me.NightBits.HttpClient

Class NightBitsHttpLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.NightBits.HttpClient.NightBitsHttpLogger

  • public class NightBitsHttpLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for logging the Http request actions This class is used to log every Http request that is made (For debugging purposes)
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    NightBits (Jeroen Saey)
